wednus.html

00001 <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd">
00002 <html><head>
00003 <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
00004 <title>Test - wednus.js</title>
00005 <script type='text/javascript' src='../../wednus.js'></script>
00006 <script type='text/javascript'>
00007 //-----------------------------------> W.load(), W.test), W.control(), W.namespace()
00008 W.module('debug');  // W.test, W.Timer
00009 // load a sample control
00010 W.control('BigInteger');
00011 // load a sample namespace (or library js)
00012 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json');
00013 //<-----------------------------------
00014 </script>
00015 
00016 <script type='text/javascript'>
00017 var timer = new W.Timer;
00018 timer.start();
00019 //-----------------------------------> W.load() : duplicating loading prevention
00020 // check module loading duplication prevention feature
00021 W.module('debug');
00022 W.module('debug');
00023 W.module('debug');
00024 W.module('debug');
00025 W.control('BigInteger');
00026 W.control('BigInteger');
00027 W.control('BigInteger');
00028 W.control('BigInteger');
00029 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json');
00030 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json');
00031 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json');
00032 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json');
00033 // intended dependency error
00034 //<-----------------------------------
00035 </script>
00036 
00037 <script type='text/javascript'>
00038 //-----------------------------------> W.modules
00039 W.test(W.modules == 'module: debug, | control: BigInteger, | include: json, | ',
00040     'W.modules, module library sanity check');
00041 //<-----------------------------------
00042 
00043 
00044 //-----------------------------------> W.events
00045 function a(arg){W.test(arg == 'hello, world!', 'event handler reserving, W.event');};
00046 // add an event handler to 'window.onload' event
00047 W.event(window, 'onload', a, 'hello, world!');
00048 W.test(typeof W.events[window]['onload'][0] == 'object', "W.events[window]['onload'] sanity check");
00049 W.event(window, 'onresize', alert, 'resized.');
00050 W.test(typeof W.events[window]['onresize'][0] == 'object', "adding event library - 2");
00051 //<-----------------------------------
00052 
00053 
00054 //-----------------------------------> W.style()
00055 var a = {style:{}};
00056 W.style(a, 'id:test2');
00057 W.test(a.id == 'test2', 'WSS: W.test property set (w/o style def. followup)');
00058 W.style(a, '|top:200px');
00059 W.test(a.style.top == '200px', 'WSS: W.test style property set (w/o prop def. proceeding)');
00060 W.style(a, 'name:goo|top:10px;left:20px');
00061 W.test(a.name == 'goo', 'WSS: W.test property set - normal');
00062 W.test(a.style.top == '10px', 'WSS: W.test style property set - normal1');
00063 W.test(a.style.left == '20px', 'WSS: W.test style property set - normal2');
00064 W.style(a, 'id:test|top:100px;left;width;height')
00065 W.test(a.id == 'test', 'WSS: W.test property set');
00066 W.test(a.style.top == '100px', 'WSS: W.test style property set - 1');
00067 W.test(a.style.left == '100px', 'WSS: W.test style property set - 2 (relaying value)');
00068 //<-----------------------------------
00069 
00070 
00071 //-----------------------------------> W.namespace(), W.check_namespace()
00072 // detect namespace confliction
00073 W.include('module/test/wednus', 'json1');
00074 //<-----------------------------------
00075 
00076 
00077 //-----------------------------------> free a namespace
00078 var c;
00079 W.rrun = c;
00080 W.test(typeof W.BigInteger != 'object', 'module unloading');
00081 //<-----------------------------------
00082 </script>
00083 </head>
00084 
00085 <body>
00086 <script type='text/javascript'>
00087 //-----------------------------------> namespace reload attempt inside of the 'body'
00088 W.control('BigInteger');
00089 W.test(typeof W.BigInteger != 'object', 'module loading after document ready.');
00090 //<-----------------------------------
00091 timer.finish();
00092 </script>
00093 </body>
00094 </html>
